column1: # C-GEM Calibration Targets: Mekong Delta - Full 3-Stage Calibration
# Literature: Nguyen & Savenije (2006) - 2.5-3.5 m spring tide
# Literature: Nguyen et al. (2008) - dry season 40-60 km
# These constrain the overall salt profile shape
# Literature: Fujii et al. (2003) - 0.2-0.5 m/s toward Hau
# Literature: Wolanski et al. (1996) - ETM at 20-40 km from mouth
# MEAN SPM [mg/L] - typical dry season values
# DISSOLVED OXYGEN [µM] - should be near saturation in estuary
# NITRATE [µM] - decreasing from river to ocean
# Literature: Nguyen et al. (2019) - 20-80 µM upstream
# DIC [µM] - mixing between river (~1500) and ocean (~2000)
